    public interface TaskListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive task events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nodeAdded(TaskNodeEvent event)
      Called when a data input node is added.
      void nodeRemoved(TaskNodeEvent event)
      Called when a data input node is removed.
      void parameterUpdated(ParameterUpdateEvent event)
      Called when the value of a parameter is changed, including when a parameter is removed.
      void taskDisposed(TaskDisposedEvent event)
      Called before the task is disposed
